scripts.prep:kovan: npm run prep:kovan:l1 && npm run prep:kovan:l2
scripts.prep:mainnet: npm run prep:mainnet:l1 && npm run prep:mainnet:l2
scripts.codegen: npm run codegen:l1 && npm run codegen:l2
scripts.build: npm run build:l1 && npm run build:l2
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run deploy:mainnet:l1 && npm run deploy:mainnet:l2
scripts.deploy:mainnet:l1: cd l1 && graph deploy --product hosted-service tarrencev/dope-wars subgraph.yaml && cd ..
scripts.deploy:mainnet:l2: cd l2 && graph deploy --product hosted-service tarrencev/dope-wars-optimism subgraph.yaml && cd ..
scripts.deploy:kovan: npm run deploy:kovan:l1 && npm run deploy:kovan:l2
scripts.deploy:kovan:l1: cd l1 && graph deploy --product hosted-service tarrencev/dope-wars-kovan subgraph.yaml && cd ..
scripts.deploy:kovan:l2: cd l2 && graph deploy --product hosted-service tarrencev/dope-wars-kovan-optimism subgraph.yaml && cd ..
scripts.deploy-local:l1: cd l1 && graph deploy ethereum-optimism-2/l1 --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy-local:l2: cd l2 && graph deploy ethereum-optimism-2/l2 --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
